Name: Kula Negroni
Ingredients: 30 ml Strucchi Red Bitter (Campari-style liqueur) infused with strawberry
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist and fresh strawberry.
STRAIN into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large cube or chunk of block ice).
EXPRESS orange zest twist over cocktail and discard.
Review: If you haven't been organised or committed to infusing strawberries in advance, then muddle a couple of small ripe strawberries in the base of the stirring glass before adding other ingredients and, after stirring with ice, fine strain into ice-filled glass.
History: Adapted from a cocktail created in 2017 by Julie Reiner at Clover Club in Manhattan, New York City.
Nutrition: One serving of Kula Negroni contains 181 calories
